synopsis.text:
With Tsukino Talent Productions as their shared launchpad, two promising idol groups, Six Gravity and Procellarum, embark on a thrilling journey to stardom. Sharing a dormitory in bustling Tokyo, these 12 young men must navigate the complexities of their burgeoning careers, academic pursuits, and interpersonal relationships.

As the leaders of the rival groups, Hajime Mutsuki and Shun Shimotsuki, announce an ambitious collaboration concert, the 'Full Moon Festival,' anticipation and tension fill the air. Despite their contrasting personalities and diverse backgrounds, the idols must unite to deliver a spectacular performance.

Each episode of this captivating anime series brings a fresh perspective by focusing on a different main character. With Six Gravity's members embodying the spirit of December to May, and Procellarum's representing June to November, viewers are treated to a rich tapestry of experiences and emotions.

Accompanied by an impressive soundtrack from renowned Vocaloid producers, this series offers a unique blend of music, drama, and slice-of-life storytelling that will captivate audiences and leave them eager for more.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
